O&M.Comments:
The total amount of O&M is KRW 12.5 million/MW.
OR intends to proceed O&M through an outsourced O&M company.

Contingency.Comments: Calculated as KRW 3.9 Million/MW. Facility operation, On-site electricity charges, Maintenance and repair operating expenses(including inverters), Security Services are included.

BOS.Comments: -50% at Signing, 40% at Pre-use inspection, 10% at COD.
